Content: The point at which the players enters the set-up game should depend on
a predetermined age before game start, so the player may choose an
ancient empire starting at turn 0, a younger empire starting at the end
of the set-up game or a pre-ftl civilization not participating in the
setup-game directly. This pre-ftl civilization might still be required
to take some actions during the last turns of the setup game to give it
more flavor, like its planetary unification.
